messages.content:
Thread:
User: Draft a donut chart spec for a toy project timeline. Audience: a kickoff. Goal: make the distribution obvious.
Assistant: Do you want the emphasis on the final point or the largest change?
User: Bias toward quick scanning over completeness.

Chart spec:

chart_spec:
  type: donut
  title: Shape of results for a toy project timeline
  subtitle: Audience: a kickoff
  goal: make the distribution obvious
  x_axis:
    label: Phase
    categories: [Checkpoint 1, Slice 2, Step 3, Phase 4, Phase 5, Slice 6, Step 7]
  y_axis:
    label: Rate
    unit: units
  legend:
    title: Scenarios
  series:
    - name: Track A
      values: [3.6, 12, 12, 3.6, 9, 12, 12]
    - name: Experiment
      values: [9, 3.6, 9, 9, 12, 9, 9]
  style:
    variant: clean
    stacking: grouped
    emphasis: highlight the biggest gap
  notes: Use the shape more than the absolute values.
